duties_responsibilities.duty: Accurately pick and pack items from company stock as specified on the pick lists.
Verify order information and provide to sales and administrative team for generation of shipment labels.
Affix shipping labels to outgoing packages and pallets to ensure the correct customer receives the correct order.
Count and verify incoming stock and put away according to FIFO.
Use company vehicle, forklift, pallet jack, and rolling carts to move inventory from various warehouses and inventory locations.
Lift and carry raw materials and finished goods according to production and fulfillment needs.
Follow all safety protocols and maintains a safe and clean work space.
Communicate inventory needs or shortages with management team.
Communicate order information with sales team.
